snippet: Investors continued to see the potential in alternative lending platforms as OnDeck Capital, which makes loans to small businesses, rallied on its first day of trading.
abstract: Investors continued to see the potential in alternative lending platforms as OnDeck Capital, which makes loans to small businesses, rallied on its first day of trading.

headline.main: OnDeck Capital, an Online Lender to Small Business, Rises After I.P.O.
